verbose_text: We found increased MCP-1, CD11b and GFAP immunoreactivity in hypercholesterolemic ischemic brains, suggesting that MCP-1 production and microglia and astrocyte activation are involved in the promotion of hyperlipidemia induced inflammation and injury in the ischemic brain.
evidence: GFAP immunoreactivity in hypercholesterolemic ischemic brains, suggesting that MCP-1 production and microglia and astrocyte activation are involved in the promotion of hyperlipidemia-induced inflammation
